name: Miscommunitcation
description:
This is a very short game where you wake up on an alien planet! You control yourself in a top down perspective and have to interact with a quirky alien to try to get home. Fast reactions and precision is needed in the bullet hell portion of the game.

This game was made for the beginner's circle jam 3 hosted by AngrySmile. This is my first game on the site and uses royalty free music but the rest of the game was made by me. Since I'm new to this, I recognize that this game is far from amazing but we all have to start somewhere.
